text: Bishapur (Middle Persian: Bay-Šāpūr; , Bishâpûr) was an ancient city in Sasanid Persia (Iran) on the ancient road between Persis and Elam. The road linked the Sassanid capitals Estakhr (very close to Persepolis) and Ctesiphon. It is located south of modern Faliyan in the Kazerun County of Fars Province, Iran. == References == == Other websites == * ; Photos * Bishapur, Photos from Iran, Livius . * City of Bishapur (Video) Category:Cities in Fars Province Category:Former national capitals Category:History of Persia Category:World Heritage Sites in Iran
title: Bishapur
